location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Mount Aboo [Ābu] to Charles Umpherston Aitchison

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Captain Donald Robertson, his resignation from his post owing to illness, his exemplary service throughout his career and requesting that he be re-appointed with the province on boundary or other duties.The letter goes on to query the grade of assistantships and to request that Lieutenant Adelbert Cecil Talbot be confirmed at the 3rd grade.
